Hi all, I\'ve searched but have came up dry on how to do this. I\'m like to edit the exhaust flame textures on a few mods I have, and specifically the size of them. how would I do this, or where in the cfg file would I look for the right values to change?

thanks!

One guy (I don\'t remember who exactly) claimed to have changed Sun flare texture *in memory at run-time,* with some kind of memory editing/cheating program. The same could be applied to particle textures.
